comments.body: It is not clear to me that "clearResult" accurately describes what it does. `markAllPartitionsAsUnfinished`? Better names are welcome!

   var numFinished = 0

comments.body:
use `/** */` style. also the sentence is a bit awkward. perhaps

"Resets the status of all partitions in this stage so they are marked as not finished."
